OneTimeDownload.MessageContent: This is an *EXPERIMENTAL* version of the Resource Pack. This means the textures are subject to change before the final release without notice.
OneTimeDownload.Title: Instructions for a one-time download
Steps: Download the latest version of the pack [here](https://github.com/GreenfieldMC/Greenfield-Texturepack/archive/master.zip).
Unzip the archive, and place the folder which was extracted inside of your resourcepack folder.

GitBasedDownload.MessageContent: Alternatively, you can use the Git platform to download and update the resourcepack without having to redo the one-time download steps every time.
GitBasedDownload.Title: Starter instructions for Git-based download and updates (only do this once)
Steps: Go to your resourcepack folder, shift right-click, and select 'Git Bash Here'.

In the Git Bash window, run the following command: `git clone https://github.com/GreenfieldMC/Greenfield-Texturepack.git` and press enter. This should create a folder called 'Greenfield-Texturepack' in your resourcepack folder.
Type `exit` and press enter when the download is complete.

UpdatingThePack.MessageContent: If you have already setup the Git repository on your machine (via the prior instructions), you can use the following instructions to update your local resourcepack versions with the latest changes.
UpdatingThePack.Title: Instructions for updating the pack (after starter instructions)
Steps: Go to your resourcepack folder, and enter into the folder that was created in the starter instructions above.
Type `git pull origin master` (or if that doesn't work, try `git pull master master`) and press enter.
Type `exit` and press enter when the update is complete.
